channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- P9 OpenPOWER
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- P9 OpenPOWER

item.title: CVE-2019-4169|2024-08-04T19:33:36.898Z -- ibm -- p9%20openpower
item.description: IBM Open Power Firmware OP910 and OP920 could allow access to BMC via IPMI using default OpenBMC password even after BMC password was changed away from the default password. IBM X-Force ID: 158702.
